I am a researcher in the robotics team at IRT Jules Verne (Institut de recherche technologique), 44340 Bouguenais, France. Prior to this I completed my PhD in IRCCyN (Institut de recherche en communications et cybern√©tique de Nantes), Ecole Centrale de Nantes, France. My research interests include: kinematic and dynamic modeling of serial and parallel manipulators, control of cooperative robots, visual servoing and human robot collaboration.
